briefdescription.para: Determines resolution factor for LTR390UV from configuration settings.
Determines resolution integration time for LTR390UV in seconds from configuration settings.
Determines gain multiplier for LTR390UV from configuration settings.
Calculates UV sensitivity value for LTR390UV from configuration settings.
